thig3.5:1.1: "O mother, you cry in the forest for Jīvā, gone beyond life.
thig3.5:1.5: were burnt in that cremation ground:
thig3.5:1.6: you sorrowed over them all with the same despair."
thig3.5:2.2: difficult to see, attached to the heart.
thig3.5:2.4: just so you dispelled this sorrow for my daughter.
thig3.5:3.1: Today pulled out is the dart,
thig3.5:3.2: I am without cravings, finally released.
